verses.verse: In the second <S%H8147><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of the reign <S%H4438><s%> of Nebuchadnezzar, <S%H5019><s%> Nebuchadnezzar <S%H5019><s%> dreamed <S%H2492><s%> dreams; <S%H2472><s%> and his spirit <S%H7307><s%> was troubled, <S%H6470><s%> and his sleep <S%H8142><s%> went from him. <S%H1961><s%>

Then the king <S%H4428><s%> commanded <S%H559><s%> to call <S%H7121><s%> the magicians, <S%H2748><s%> and the enchanters, <S%H825><s%> and the sorcerers, <S%H3784><s%> and the Chaldeans, <S%H3778><s%> to tell <S%H5046><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> his dreams. <S%H2472><s%> So they came <S%H935><s%> in and stood <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the king. <S%H4428><s%>

The king <S%H4428><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to them, <S%H2492><s%> I have dreamed a dream, <S%H2472><s%> and my spirit <S%H7307><s%> is troubled <S%H6470><s%> to know <S%H3045><s%> the dream. <S%H2472><s%>

Then spoke <S%H1696><s%> the Chaldeans <S%H3778><s%> to the king <S%H4428><s%> in the Syrian language, <S%H762><s%> O king, <S%H4430><s%> live <S%H2418><s%> forever: <S%H5957><s%> tell <S%H560><s%> your servants <S%H5649><s%> the dream, <S%H2493><s%> and we will show <S%H2324><s%> the interpretation. <S%H6591><s%>

The king <S%H4430><s%> answered <S%H6032><s%> the Chaldeans, <S%H3779><s%> The thing <S%H4406><s%> is gone <S%H230><s%> from me: <S%H4481><s%> if <S%H2006><s%> you don't <S%H3809><s%> make known <S%H3046><s%> to me the dream <S%H2493><s%> and its interpretation, <S%H6591><s%> you shall be cut <S%H5648><s%> in pieces, <S%H1917><s%> and your houses <S%H1005><s%> shall be made <S%H7761><s%> a dunghill. <S%H5122><s%>

But if <S%H2006><s%> you show <S%H2324><s%> the dream <S%H2493><s%> and its interpretation, <S%H6591><s%> you shall receive <S%H6902><s%> of <S%H4481><s%> me <S%H6925><s%> gifts <S%H4978><s%> and rewards <S%H5023><s%> and great <S%H7690><s%> honor: <S%H3367><s%> therefore <S%H3861><s%> show <S%H2324><s%> me the dream <S%H2493><s%> and its interpretation. <S%H6591><s%>

They answered <S%H6032><s%> the second <S%H8579><s%> time and said, <S%H560><s%> Let the king <S%H4430><s%> tell <S%H560><s%> his servants <S%H5649><s%> the dream, <S%H2493><s%> and we will show <S%H2324><s%> the interpretation. <S%H6591><s%>

The king <S%H4430><s%> answered, <S%H6032><s%> I <S%H576><s%> know <S%H3046><s%> of <S%H4481><s%> a certainty <S%H3330><s%> that you <S%H608><s%> would gain <S%H2084><s%> time, <S%H5732><s%> because <S%H6903><s%> you see <S%H2370><s%> the thing <S%H4406><s%> is gone <S%H230><s%> from me. <S%H4481><s%>

But if <S%H2006><s%> you don't <S%H3809><s%> make known <S%H3046><s%> to me the dream, <S%H2493><s%> there is but one <S%H1932><s%> law <S%H1882><s%> for you; <S%H2164><s%> for you have prepared lying <S%H3538><s%> and corrupt <S%H7844><s%> words <S%H4406><s%> to speak <S%H560><s%> before <S%H6925><s%> me, <S%H5705><s%> until the time <S%H5732><s%> be changed: <S%H8133><s%> therefore <S%H3861><s%> tell <S%H560><s%> me the dream, <S%H2493><s%> and I shall know <S%H3046><s%> that <S%H1768><s%> you can show <S%H2324><s%> me its interpretation. <S%H6591><s%>

The Chaldeans <S%H3779><s%> answered <S%H6032><s%> before <S%H6925><s%> the king, <S%H4430><s%> and said, <S%H560><s%> There is <S%H383><s%> not <S%H3809><s%> a man <S%H606><s%> on <S%H5922><s%> the earth <S%H3007><s%> who can <S%H3202><s%> show <S%H2324><s%> the king <S%H4430><s%>'s matter, <S%H4406><s%> because <S%H6903><s%> no <S%H3809><s%> king, <S%H4430><s%> lord, <S%H7229><s%> or ruler, <S%H7990><s%> has asked <S%H7593><s%> such <S%H1836><s%> a thing <S%H4406><s%> of any <S%H3606><s%> magician, <S%H2749><s%> or enchanter, <S%H826><s%> or Chaldean. <S%H3779><s%>

It is a rare <S%H3358><s%> thing <S%H4406><s%> that the king <S%H4430><s%> requires, <S%H7593><s%> and there is <S%H383><s%> no <S%H3809><s%> other <S%H321><s%> who can show <S%H2324><s%> it before <S%H6925><s%> the king, <S%H4430><s%> except <S%H3861><s%> the gods, <S%H426><s%> whose dwelling <S%H4070><s%> is <S%H383><s%> not <S%H3809><s%> with <S%H5974><s%> flesh. <S%H1321><s%>

For <S%H6903><s%> this <S%H1836><s%> cause <S%H3606><s%> the king <S%H4430><s%> was angry <S%H1149><s%> and very <S%H7690><s%> furious, <S%H7108><s%> and commanded <S%H560><s%> to destroy <S%H7><s%> all <S%H3606><s%> the wise <S%H2445><s%> men of Babylon. <S%H895><s%>

So the decree <S%H1882><s%> went forth, <S%H5312><s%> and the wise <S%H2445><s%> men were to be slain; <S%H6992><s%> and they sought <S%H1156><s%> Daniel <S%H1841><s%> and his companions <S%H2269><s%> to be slain. <S%H6992><s%>

Then <S%H116><s%> Daniel <S%H1841><s%> returned answer <S%H8421><s%> with counsel <S%H5843><s%> and prudence <S%H2942><s%> to Arioch <S%H746><s%> the captain <S%H7229><s%> of <S%H1768><s%> the king <S%H4430><s%>'s guard, <S%H2877><s%> who was gone forth <S%H5312><s%> to kill <S%H6992><s%> the wise <S%H2445><s%> men of Babylon; <S%H895><s%>

he answered <S%H6032><s%> Arioch <S%H746><s%> the king <S%H4430><s%>'s captain, <S%H7990><s%> Why <S%H4101><s%> is the decree <S%H1882><s%> so urgent <S%H2685><s%> from <S%H4481><s%> the king? <S%H4430><s%> Then <S%H116><s%> Arioch <S%H746><s%> made the thing <S%H4406><s%> known <S%H3046><s%> to Daniel. <S%H1841><s%>

Daniel <S%H1841><s%> went in, <S%H5954><s%> and desired <S%H1156><s%> of <S%H4481><s%> the king <S%H4430><s%> that he would appoint <S%H5415><s%> him a time, <S%H2166><s%> and he would show <S%H2324><s%> the king <S%H4430><s%> the interpretation. <S%H6591><s%>

Then <S%H116><s%> Daniel <S%H1841><s%> went <S%H236><s%> to his house, <S%H1005><s%> and made the thing <S%H4406><s%> known <S%H3046><s%> to Hananiah, <S%H2608><s%> Mishael, <S%H4333><s%> and Azariah, <S%H5839><s%> his companions: <S%H2269><s%>

that they would desire <S%H1156><s%> mercies <S%H7359><s%> of <S%H4481><s%> the God <S%H426><s%> of heaven <S%H8065><s%> concerning <S%H5922><s%> this <S%H1836><s%> secret; <S%H7328><s%> that Daniel <S%H1841><s%> and his companions <S%H2269><s%> should not <S%H3809><s%> perish <S%H7><s%> with <S%H5974><s%> the rest <S%H7606><s%> of the wise <S%H2445><s%> men of Babylon. <S%H895><s%>

Then <S%H116><s%> was the secret <S%H7328><s%> revealed <S%H1541><s%> to Daniel <S%H1841><s%> in a vision <S%H2376><s%> of the night. <S%H3916><s%> Then <S%H116><s%> Daniel <S%H1841><s%> blessed <S%H1289><s%> the God <S%H426><s%> of heaven. <S%H8065><s%>

Daniel <S%H1841><s%> answered, <S%H6032><s%> Blessed <S%H1289><s%> be <S%H1934><s%> the name <S%H8036><s%> of God <S%H426><s%> forever <S%H5705><s%> and ever; <S%H5957><s%> for <S%H4481><s%> wisdom <S%H2452><s%> and might <S%H1370><s%> are his. <S%H1932><s%>

He changes <S%H8133><s%> the times <S%H5732><s%> and the seasons; <S%H2166><s%> he removes <S%H5709><s%> kings, <S%H4430><s%> and sets up <S%H6966><s%> kings; <S%H4430><s%> he gives <S%H3052><s%> wisdom <S%H2452><s%> to the wise, <S%H2445><s%> and knowledge <S%H4486><s%> to those who have <S%H3046><s%> understanding; <S%H999><s%>

he reveals <S%H1541><s%> the deep <S%H5994><s%> and secret things; <S%H5642><s%> he knows <S%H3046><s%> what <S%H4101><s%> is in the darkness, <S%H2816><s%> and the light <S%H5094><s%> dwells <S%H8271><s%> with him. <S%H5974><s%>

I <S%H576><s%> thank <S%H3029><s%> you, <S%H7624><s%> and praise you, <S%H426><s%> you God of my fathers, <S%H2><s%> who have given <S%H3052><s%> me wisdom <S%H2452><s%> and might, <S%H1370><s%> and have now <S%H3705><s%> made known <S%H3046><s%> to me what we desired <S%H1156><s%> of you; <S%H4481><s%> for you have made known <S%H3046><s%> to us the king <S%H4430><s%>'s matter. <S%H4406><s%>

Therefore <S%H6903><s%> Daniel <S%H1841><s%> went in <S%H5954><s%> to <S%H5922><s%> Arioch, <S%H746><s%> whom the king <S%H4430><s%> had appointed <S%H4483><s%> to destroy <S%H7><s%> the wise <S%H2445><s%> men of Babylon; <S%H895><s%> he went <S%H236><s%> and said <S%H560><s%> thus <S%H3652><s%> to him: <S%H409><s%> Don't destroy <S%H7><s%> the wise <S%H2445><s%> men of Babylon; <S%H895><s%> bring me in <S%H5954><s%> before <S%H6925><s%> the king, <S%H4430><s%> and I will show <S%H2324><s%> to the king <S%H4430><s%> the interpretation. <S%H6591><s%>

Then <S%H116><s%> Arioch <S%H746><s%> brought in <S%H5954><s%> Daniel <S%H1841><s%> before <S%H6925><s%> the king <S%H4430><s%> in haste, <S%H927><s%> and said <S%H560><s%> thus <S%H3652><s%> to him, <S%H7912><s%> I have found a man <S%H1400><s%> of the children of the captivity <S%H1123><s%> of <S%H4481><s%> Judah, <S%H3061><s%> who will make known <S%H3046><s%> to the king <S%H4430><s%> the interpretation. <S%H6591><s%>

The king <S%H4430><s%> answered <S%H6032><s%> Daniel, <S%H1841><s%> whose name <S%H8036><s%> was Belteshazzar, <S%H1096><s%> Are <S%H383><s%> you able <S%H3546><s%> to make known <S%H3046><s%> to me the dream <S%H2493><s%> which I have seen, <S%H2370><s%> and its interpretation? <S%H6591><s%>

Daniel <S%H1841><s%> answered <S%H6032><s%> before <S%H6925><s%> the king, <S%H4430><s%> and said, <S%H560><s%> The secret <S%H7328><s%> which the king <S%H4430><s%> has demanded <S%H7593><s%> can neither <S%H3202><s%> wise <S%H2445><s%> men, <S%H826><s%> enchanters, magicians, <S%H2749><s%> nor soothsayers, <S%H1505><s%> show <S%H2324><s%> to the king; <S%H4430><s%>

but <S%H1297><s%> there is <S%H383><s%> a God <S%H426><s%> in heaven <S%H8065><s%> who reveals <S%H1541><s%> secrets, <S%H7328><s%> and he has made known <S%H3046><s%> to the king <S%H4430><s%> Nebuchadnezzar <S%H5020><s%> what <S%H4101><s%> shall be <S%H1934><s%> in the latter <S%H320><s%> days. <S%H3118><s%> Your dream, <S%H2493><s%> and the visions <S%H2376><s%> of your head <S%H7217><s%> on <S%H5922><s%> your bed, <S%H4903><s%> are these: <S%H1836><s%>

as for you, <S%H607><s%> O king, <S%H4430><s%> your thoughts <S%H7476><s%> came <S%H5559><s%> into your mind on <S%H5922><s%> your bed, <S%H4903><s%> what <S%H4101><s%> should happen <S%H1934><s%> hereafter; <S%H311><s%> and he who reveals <S%H1541><s%> secrets <S%H7328><s%> has made known <S%H3046><s%> to you what <S%H4101><s%> shall happen. <S%H1934><s%>

But as for me, <S%H576><s%> this <S%H1836><s%> secret <S%H7328><s%> is not <S%H3809><s%> revealed <S%H1541><s%> to me <S%H576><s%> for any wisdom <S%H2452><s%> that I have <S%H383><s%> more than <S%H4481><s%> any <S%H3606><s%> living, <S%H2417><s%> but <S%H3861><s%> to the intent that <S%H5922><s%> the interpretation <S%H6591><s%> may be made known <S%H3046><s%> to the king, <S%H4430><s%> and that you may know <S%H3046><s%> the thoughts <S%H7476><s%> of your heart. <S%H3825><s%>

You, <S%H607><s%> O king, <S%H4430><s%> saw, <S%H1934><s%> and behold, <S%H431><s%> a great <S%H2298><s%> image. <S%H6755><s%> This <S%H1797><s%> image, <S%H6755><s%> which was mighty, <S%H7229><s%> and whose brightness <S%H2122><s%> was excellent, <S%H3493><s%> stood <S%H6966><s%> before <S%H6903><s%> you; <S%H7299><s%> and its aspect was awesome. <S%H1763><s%>

As for this image, <S%H6755><s%> its head <S%H7217><s%> was of fine <S%H2869><s%> gold, <S%H1722><s%> its breast <S%H2306><s%> and its arms <S%H1872><s%> of silver, <S%H3702><s%> its belly <S%H4577><s%> and its thighs <S%H3410><s%> of brass, <S%H5174><s%>
its legs <S%H8243><s%> of iron, <S%H6523><s%> its feet <S%H7271><s%> part <S%H4481><s%> of iron, <S%H6523><s%> and part <S%H4481><s%> of clay. <S%H2635><s%>

You saw <S%H2370><s%> until <S%H5705><s%> a stone <S%H69><s%> was cut out <S%H1505><s%> without <S%H3809><s%> hands, <S%H3028><s%> which struck <S%H4223><s%> the image <S%H6755><s%> on <S%H5922><s%> its feet <S%H7271><s%> that were of iron <S%H6523><s%> and clay, <S%H2635><s%> and broke <S%H1855><s%> them <S%H1994><s%> in pieces. <S%H1855><s%>

Then <S%H116><s%> was the iron, <S%H6523><s%> the clay, <S%H2635><s%> the brass, <S%H5174><s%> the silver, <S%H3702><s%> and the gold, <S%H1722><s%> broken in pieces <S%H1855><s%> together, <S%H2298><s%> and became <S%H1934><s%> like the chaff <S%H5784><s%> of <S%H4481><s%> the summer <S%H7007><s%> threshing floors; <S%H147><s%> and the wind <S%H7308><s%> carried <S%H5376><s%> them <S%H1994><s%> away, <S%H5376><s%> so that <S%H3606><s%> no <S%H3809><s%> place <S%H870><s%> was found <S%H7912><s%> for them: <S%H69><s%> and the stone that struck <S%H4223><s%> the image <S%H6755><s%> became <S%H1934><s%> a great <S%H7229><s%> mountain, <S%H2906><s%> and filled <S%H4391><s%> the whole <S%H3606><s%> earth. <S%H772><s%>
This <S%H1836><s%> is the dream; <S%H2493><s%> and we will tell <S%H560><s%> its interpretation <S%H6591><s%> before <S%H6925><s%> the king. <S%H4430><s%>

You, <S%H607><s%> O king, <S%H4430><s%> are king <S%H4430><s%> of kings, <S%H4430><s%> to whom the God <S%H426><s%> of heaven <S%H8065><s%> has given <S%H3052><s%> the kingdom, <S%H4437><s%> the power, <S%H2632><s%> and the strength, <S%H8632><s%> and the glory; <S%H3367><s%>

and wherever <S%H3606><s%> the children <S%H1123><s%> of men <S%H606><s%> dwell, <S%H1753><s%> the animals <S%H2423><s%> of the field <S%H1251><s%> and the birds <S%H5776><s%> of the sky <S%H8065><s%> has he given <S%H3052><s%> into your hand, <S%H3028><s%> and has made you to rule <S%H7981><s%> over them all: <S%H3606><s%> you <S%H607><s%> are the head <S%H7217><s%> of gold. <S%H1722><s%>

After <S%H870><s%> you shall arise <S%H6966><s%> another <S%H317><s%> kingdom <S%H4437><s%> inferior <S%H772><s%> to you; <S%H4481><s%> and another <S%H317><s%> third <S%H8523><s%> kingdom <S%H4437><s%> of brass, <S%H5174><s%> which shall bear rule <S%H7981><s%> over all <S%H3606><s%> the earth. <S%H772><s%>

The fourth <S%H7244><s%> kingdom <S%H4437><s%> shall be <S%H1934><s%> strong <S%H8624><s%> as iron, <S%H6523><s%> because iron <S%H6523><s%> breaks in pieces <S%H1855><s%> and subdues <S%H2827><s%> all <S%H3606><s%> things; <S%H6903><s%> and as iron <S%H6523><s%> that crushes <S%H7490><s%> all <S%H3606><s%> these, <S%H459><s%> shall it break in pieces <S%H1855><s%> and crush. <S%H7490><s%>

Whereas you saw <S%H2370><s%> the feet <S%H7271><s%> and toes, <S%H677><s%> part <S%H4481><s%> of potters <S%H6353><s%>' clay, <S%H2635><s%> and part <S%H4481><s%> of iron, <S%H6523><s%> it shall be <S%H1934><s%> a divided <S%H6386><s%> kingdom; <S%H4437><s%> but <S%H4481><s%> there shall be <S%H1934><s%> in it of <S%H4481><s%> the strength <S%H5326><s%> of <S%H4481><s%> the iron, <S%H6523><s%> because you saw <S%H2370><s%> the iron <S%H6523><s%> mixed <S%H6151><s%> with miry <S%H2917><s%> clay. <S%H2635><s%>

As the toes <S%H677><s%> of the feet <S%H7271><s%> were part <S%H4481><s%> of iron, <S%H6523><s%> and part <S%H4481><s%> of clay, <S%H2635><s%> so the kingdom <S%H4437><s%> shall be <S%H1934><s%> partly <S%H4481><s%> strong, <S%H8624><s%> and partly <S%H4481><s%> broken. <S%H8406><s%>

Whereas <S%H1768><s%> you saw <S%H2370><s%> the iron <S%H6523><s%> mixed <S%H6151><s%> with miry <S%H2917><s%> clay, <S%H2635><s%> they shall mingle themselves <S%H1934><s%> with the seed <S%H2234><s%> of men; <S%H606><s%> but they shall <S%H1934><s%> not <S%H3809><s%> cling <S%H1693><s%> to <S%H5974><s%> one <S%H1836><s%> another, <S%H1836><s%> even <S%H1888><s%> as iron <S%H6523><s%> does not <S%H3809><s%> mingle <S%H6151><s%> with clay. <S%H2635><s%>

In the days <S%H3118><s%> of those <S%H581><s%> kings <S%H4430><s%> shall the God <S%H426><s%> of heaven <S%H8065><s%> set up <S%H6966><s%> a kingdom <S%H4437><s%> which shall never <S%H5957><s%> be destroyed, <S%H2255><s%> nor <S%H3809><s%> shall its sovereignty <S%H4437><s%> be left <S%H7662><s%> to another <S%H321><s%> people; <S%H5972><s%> but it shall break in pieces <S%H1855><s%> and consume <S%H5487><s%> all <S%H3606><s%> these <S%H459><s%> kingdoms, <S%H4437><s%> and it <S%H1932><s%> shall stand <S%H6966><s%> forever. <S%H5957><s%>
